docs:lint.description: Run Markdown lint for all active docs

links:check.run: docker run --rm -v "${PWD}:/workspace" -w /workspace lycheeverse/lychee --config lychee.toml --no-progress README.md 01_ReferenceLibrary/**/*.md 02_Planning-and-Development/**/*.md 05_Todos/**/*.md 07_LearningGround/**/*.md Daily-Migration-Tracker.md Migration-Plan-Todos-LearningGround.md .github/**/*.md
links:check.description: Validate links using Lychee via Docker

workspace:health.description: Check for 00_ prefix violations (excluding legacy content)

prompts:validate.description: Validate all prompt files for markdown compliance

migration:status.run: if (Test-Path 'Daily-Migration-Tracker.md') { Write-Host 'Migration tracker found'; Get-Content 'Daily-Migration-Tracker.md' | Select-String -Pattern '\[x\]|\[ \]' | Select-Object -First 10 } else { Write-Host 'No migration tracker found' }
